website_summaries.verdict: The best near-professional set of timbales for anyone wanting the best feel and sound.
pros: Consists of standard sized 13" and 14" timbales with 6 1/2" deep shells
Large drums offer plenty of space for different types of strikes to produce a variety of sounds and tones
Drum heads are easy to tune using the drum kit style tuning keys and lugs
cons: Timbale set may require some extra time with the initial setup since it lacks proper instructions

customer_reviews.title: When starting out, center and edge smacks and rolls all have distinct sounds for creating yours.
customer_reviews.text: Percussion is my favorite from string or keyboard, etc.. Tuning is up to one's favorite pitch, but the surface for stricking on this model is to thin. Is LP willing to replace them with a thicker smack surface for free? I've always was around the LP products since 1969, which in my opinion were crafted much better. Otherwise great starter set, among my other LP Instruments that I use.
customer_reviews.author: Orlando Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent they can take a beaten but invest in new sticks literally broke them within 5 minutes of use
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend them for someone who loves all type of instruments
customer_reviews.text: My hubby loves them!! I would recommend them for someone who loves all type of instruments. They look beautiful in our living room. I got it for him so he could play them, and he does they are just awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Negra

customer_reviews.title: Decent Quality for the Price
customer_reviews.text: These Timbales are a great value; while they are not top of the line percussion Timbales they are good at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: O. Navedo

customer_reviews.title: Lp Lpa256 Aspire Series Timbale Set
customer_reviews.text: I'm a drum-set player so I feel that the stand and the cowbell holder are not as good as they could be, but for the price they are the best I have found. Love them so far!
customer_reviews.author: RAK

customer_reviews.title: Very nice timbales!!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound! Easy to assemble. Lots of hours of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Edgar S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband received these timbales for Christmas and loves them!! They look and sound like the pros!!! Very pleased with the quality and sound!!
customer_reviews.author: morenurse

customer_reviews.title: it is a little confusing to figure out how to set up if youre new to timbales like me. However
customer_reviews.text: Since there are no instructions, it is a little confusing to figure out how to set up if youre new to timbales like me. However, once it's set up (I asked someone at a local drum shop to show me how) it's amazing! They sound great and come with a pair of sticks as well as an attachable bell. I recommend adding a crash cymbal and claw as well as a block for the full experience. It may be expensive in the end but still worth it. They sound almost as good as the pro set we used in my college Afro Cuban ensemble. Strongly recommend for beginners or just for experienced players who just want to practice.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Reina

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good set for your first set! Latin percussion makes a product.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey Reid Jr

customer_reviews.title: I'm very satisfied with it
customer_reviews.text: Even that I order the LP Aspire timbales, I got the Toca Player series, I'm very satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Luis Ortega

customer_reviews.title: No Directions
customer_reviews.text: I'm a novice learning how to play the timbales and there were no directions provided on how to assemble this or recommended setups
customer_reviews.author: Miguel A. Soto Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Timbales
customer_reviews.text: Great set of timables, good quality and price. Great bundle much lower cost than bought separately.
customer_reviews.author: H. Marx

product_meta.title: Latin Percussion LPA256 Aspire Series 13" & 14" Timbale Set with Cowbell
product_meta.description: LP Aspire Timbales are a great and affordable place to begin learning the magic of timbale playing, whether used traditionally or as an addition to a drum kit. This timbale set consists of standard sized 13" and 14" timbales with 6 1/2" deep shells which provide characteristic timbale sound and project enough to cut through even the loudest bands. Features include resonant plastic heads, drum kit style tuning, standard tuning rods and lugs, triple flanged "stick-saver" hoops, height adjustable double braced stand with tilter, LP Aspire Cowbell with holder, and a drum key is also included.
feature_bullets: For 50 years LP has created the best percussion instruments played worldwide.
